introduction: Film director and television writer Mirza Idrizovic was born in Sarajevo in 1939. Where and died in 1997. His first film was "Ram za sliku moje drage" (1968), While the film "Miris dunja" (1982), Which deals with the relation between Muslims and Jews during the occupation of Sarajevo in the Second World War, the Yugoslav representative for the award Oscar and the Golden Arena for the scenario.The first feature film by Mirza Idrizovic is Ram Za Sliku Moje Drage (1968), the issue djetinstvo and growth, was humoristic poetic form and references to the then New Wave Cinema. Idrizovic's films were smjesi humor, nostalgia, nadrealistickog prosedea, and mild sorrow. These are the basic karkteristike and its following movies Life is a mass phenomenon (1970), and spotted the girl (1973)
